text: Lasse Braun (born Alberto Ferro; 11 January 1936 – 16 February 2015) was an Italian pornographer, movie director, producer, screenwriter, novelist and researcher. He was known for creating hardcore pornography movies and selling them to peep shows in the United States. Braun died from complications of diabetes on February 16, 2015 in Rome, Italy at the age of 78. ==Other websites== * * *Rotten.com Library Biography *Lasse Braun – his life and his movies Category:1936 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from diabetes Category:Disease-related deaths in Italy Category:Italian movie directors Category:Italian movie producers Category:Italian screenwriters
title: Lasse Braun
